summary:
I have developed deep and solid experience with data analysis, especially linked to continuous improvement, product optimization (software products) and vendor management (master data and performance). This was done in the fields of procure to pay, pricing and operations, in the industries of manufacturing, software and logistics (warehousing and transport), through more than 9 years of work experience in the Caribbean, United Kingdom, France and the Netherlands. 

My interest lies in the design and reworking of processes to optimize performance and better manage risks, thus creating more efficient systems delivering measurably improved results, through data analysis and business intelligence. 

I am working toward a position where I can act as a subject matter expert for teaching others how to improve efficiency by analysis and data visibility.

profile_positions.description:
Scope: Pricing, including Product and Machine Learning (model performance)

 Primary focus:
- Data mart ownership to enable stakeholders to use pricing information autonomously by ensuring the availability of detailed documentation (using dbt to generate YML files and Google sheets to document and reference data sources) and by building a comprehensive catalogue of relevant data points and metrics (using SQL in Snowflake and LookML). Documentation went from 11% to 100% complete and mandatory.
- Dashboard and report conceptualization, ownership and creation in Looker; including creation of relevant backend data points for Looker, using SQL and dbt ( testing in Snowflake, editing in VS code)

Secondary Focus:

-Working with Machine Learning team to evaluate expected cost model performance and change impact, through creation of performance metrics and dashboards. Model accuracy goes from 46% to 83% between April (date of dashboard creation) and June 2023.
profile_positions.title: Analyst II, Pricing

profile_positions.description:
Scope: Operations Execution, Inbound Support and Visibility, including Product

 Primary focus:
- Data point creation, surfacing and testing for Operations topics, both in data tables (SQL with Git version control) and BI tables (Looker with Look ML)
-Definitions and explanations (including tests for validation) defined in glossary for all existing data points and metrics in Ops Analytics data mart (in Data Catalog and Looker) using a combination of YML and MD files as well as Look ML (and SQL and Excel for data collection and cleaning). Documentation went from 23% to 100% complete and mandatory.
- Bug fixes for data points and dashboards in BI tables (Looker), DWH (Snowflake)

Project contributions:

- Forecasting of business process outsourcing inbound support volumes for budget planning, using historic and forecast operations and finance data
-Removal of deprecated data points and creation of tests for validation to deprecate (linked to documentation of data points effort)
profile_positions.title: Analyst II, Operations Analytics

profile_positions.description:
Scope : Operations Execution and Inbound Support, including product

- Primary focus on manual tracking, including business process outsourcing performance, and metrics for driving operational visibility product changes
- Secondary focus on workforce planning and incident reporting metrics, as well as inbound support measured by communication efficacy for email (via Front) and call (via Aircall) actions
-Project Contributions: 
Cost of Service, primarily calculations for time and cost per load on incident and tracking actions
Data management, primarily documentation and testing of newly created data points 
Volume and performance modelling, to set targets for incentive models on operations visibility topics

Creation and maintenance of reports and dashboards in various mediums to allow decision making. Using:

-Primarily (daily usage) through the use of Looker, Google Sheets and SQL (in Snowflake). 
-Secondarily (irregular usage) through embedded analytic tools in Front and Aircall, and Python (via Anaconda)
profile_positions.title: Analyst II, Operations Execution

profile_positions.description:
Development of KPIs for the Amsterdam Purchasing Unit including formatting, collaborative strategy and data sourcing, as well as server querying (Microsoft SQL via SSMS) and Power BI report creation together with Research team.

Inbound process improvement (project) encompassing actions such as: implementation of error reason code tracking, process mapping, RASCI development, incident reporting structure creation and working instruction creation
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst / Procurement Process Officer

profile_positions.description:
Worked in the P2P Global Business Solutions EMEAR team, fully responsible for 4 entities of DS Italy, DS South Africa, DS Spain and DS Middle East while having a shared responsibility for DSSE (France).

Efficiency improvement projects for global procure-to-pay processes, strengthening the harmonization of processes, performance monitoring and digitization of reporting

Organized and executed a digitalisation of invoice receipt campaign, with digital receipt of invoices in EMEAR from 67% to 93% and paid on time KPIs increased by 13%. Campaign also successfully replicated in ASIA and NAM.

Creating KPIs for procure-to-pay processes including vendor management, invoicing, sourcing, contracting

Worked with IT for planning and deploying improvement projects, specifically related to vendor data cleaning with database mass updates (Oracle Database via Oracle SQL Developer) , KPI dashboard visualization (SAP Business Objects) and approval workflow simplification
profile_positions.title: Analyst, Procurement Process

profile_positions.description:
Identified the major points of risk and adapted and documented risk management procedures for software suppliers in accordance with group strategy

 Developed KPIs for supplier performance which were included in contract service level agreements
profile_positions.title: Supplier Management Intern

profile_positions.description:
Created process charts and KPIs for existing procedures to determine inefficiencies in current business processes (primarily contracting and sales operations)

Implemented strategies and provided guidance for improving effectiveness in finance and sales operational processes (resulting in increased invoices paid on time and reduced time-to-submit of invoices and expenses)

Managed vendor contracts with facilities providers across EMEA and APAC offices for both direct and indirect purchases
profile_positions.title: Operations Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Ascertained stock order requirements through analysis, forecasting and the application of logic to provide a steady inventory for UK, USA, German, Turkish and Canadian warehouses

Organized and completed ERP system data review (inventory and vendor) for accuracy of supplier lead times and stock planning variables

Created KPIs for supplier performance (represented in Excel and Netsuite Suite Analytics), which were included in contract negotations and renewals

Data analysis of warehouse packing and dispatch schedules as linked to sales orders, allowing better preparedness and so reducing overtime per month by 35%

Created a simulation project (using VBA and csv data downloads from Netsuite ERP) to understand if costs of holding larger inventory would be greater than air freight costs of urgent orders resulted in leasing of an additional warehouse (savings of 9% the following year when comparing shipping costs against warehousing costs)
profile_positions.title: Procurement & Operations Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Researched and designed cooling system for machine workshop and created installation plan 

Digitized and implemented the system of insurance deductions from weekly payroll

Developed quarterly performance reports for Ministry of Works vehicles including measurement of performance characteristics

Sourcing of machine parts and vehicles for national fleet

profile_positions.description: Assisted with development and design of products which have since been launched. These products now hold a large portion of the environmentally-friendly housing market.
